cab.content: 12 30 5(This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic (VlajeStyfs GovernmenttiOPERATIONS . : From : General Barter. Russia.5th September 1917.To : CT.G.S. War Office. Ho,123012oh Army is non-existent. Germans are making their main attack on a line Rod (one group undecipherable) Poi s Hint senberg on Venden road.6th Siberian is doomed and as far as Sunsel on river Little;Egel;where right flank of 21st Corps stands Lhere are no formed troops to the: south of it. Whole regiments have.disappeared and there are only a few hundred men in divisions. The only road which Army has to retire on J.s blocked v;ith fugitives and transport. Almost all transport must be lost and it will be difficult to save any artillery. I see no hope of holding; Venden road and no one will resist if Germans attempt landing.
